DataElement.preferredName: Patient Age 20 Year Body Mass Index Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numerical response that represents the calculated weight to height ratio of a patient at age 20.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Age 20 Year Body Mass Index
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::20_A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Age Integer::20 Year Body Mass Index
Property.preferredDefinition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::20:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
An individual's weight in kilograms divided by the square of the height in meters.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A calculated numerical quantity that represents an individual's weight to height ratio.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: An individual's weight in kilograms divided by the square of the height in meters.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
